title: DS4OWD Analytics
text: goal ds4owdanalytics make dark data DS4OWD course publicly available

title: DS4OWD Analytics
text: can install development version ds4owdanalytics GitHub : Alternatively, can download individual datasets CSV XLSX file table . Click Download CSV. window opens displays CSV browser. Right-click anywhere inside window select “Save Page …”. Save file folder choice.
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("openwashdata/ds4owdanalytics") ## Run the following code in console if you don't have the packages ## install.packages(c("dplyr", "knitr", "readr", "stringr", "gt", "kableExtra")) library(dplyr) library(knitr) library(readr) library(stringr) library(gt) library(kableExtra)

title: DS4OWD Analytics

text: dataset course_participation contains anonymized data participation online session DS4OWD course 734 observations 5 variables overview variable names, see following table.

ds4owd_browser: Data on visits to the DS4OWD website by browser — ds4owd_browser
text: tibble 17 rows 6 variables browser Browser used accesss DS4OWD website pageviews Number pages viewed visitors Total number unique visitors visit_duration Duration visit (seconds) visits Number non-unique visits website bounce_rate Percentage users "bouncing" website. bounce visitor spends less 30 seconds website
